name: Creepy Pond
description:
How long you can survive in the Creepy Pond?   Oo

Not sure why game lags at first run, but eventually you can start it again after few seconds and there should be no more lags

.

Currently there no mobile versions (Android, IOS). These may be available in future

Standalone Versions runs smoother and have a bit more special effects, you can find these below ^.^
